activities.title: MFU Music Festival 2024
activities.description:
🗣️Ahhhhh.. It's not a big job for sure!! ️
🔊In addition to concerts and appointment cards, we also have fun zone for everyone to come and enjoy.🎪

In the music festival “MFU Music Festival 2024 Angem Phase 2”❤️ 🔥
🗓On 31 October 2567, time 18:00 onward.
📍 At Landao

activities.title: Halloween (Horror Night)
activities.description:
Join us if you dare! 🎃

You are invited to join our Halloween Booth in MFU Music Festival 2024 on Monday, 31 October 2024 starting at 18.00 hrs. at HRH Princess Srinagarindra Statue (Landao).


Highlights of this activity you can't miss:
- "Ghost" Photo Exhibition  😈👹
- Halloween Makeup 👄💄
- D.I.Y. Halloween Cookies 🍪
- Halloween Photo Booth & Costume Contest 🎃


Come and get free Halloween Cookies 🍪 at our booth!! (First come first serve for 100 visitors) 


For students who would like to join Halloween costume contest, please walk in to register at the booth during 18.00-18.45 hrs.

activities.title: Chinese & English Corner
activities.description:
You're invited!!!

🀄🎉 欢迎来到 Chinese & English Corner at MFU! 🎉🀄

Ready to dive into the world of Chinese & English language and culture? 🌏

✨ Join us for a fun and engaging "Chinese Corner" activity where you can practice your Mandarin, learn about Chinese traditions, and make new friends! 🗣️🤝
📅 Date: November 20, 2024 
🕒 Time: 11:00 AM - 1:00 PM 
📍 Location: Study Room no 6, Chinese Language Center, Mae Fah Luang University

Whether you're a beginner or a fluent speaker, there's something for everyone. Let's explore the beauty of the Chinese culture together! 🇨🇳🌸

See you there! 😃
activities.location: Study Room no 6, Chinese Language Center, Mae Fah Luang University

activities.title: Fight For Flag 🚩
activities.description:
🚩ပထမနှစ် ကျောင်းသူကျောင်းသား အားလုံး 
အတွက် “fight for flag” activity join ရန် information အောက်မှာဖော်ပြထားပါတယ်….
(ဘယ်လို join ရမလဲဆိုတာ ကိုယ့်major အလိုက်ဖွဲ့ထားတဲ့ line group တွေထဲမှာ သွားရောက်မေးမြန်နိုင်ပါတယ်) 

“”information အပြည့်အစုံကို 📌student union of MFU📌page မှာလဲသွားရောက်မေးမြန်နိုင်ပါတတယ်…

🚩✨We invite all first year students to participate in the “Fight For Flag" activity, to build a strong bond between juniors and seniors with red-gold blood together.✨🔺

🌠Saturday 10th December 20224.
📎Time: 08:00-16:00 
📍Location: Indoor Stadium

☑️MFU333 (participant): 12 points
Credit to student union of MF

activities.description: We will discuss about what questions to ask when we have to meet with ATA IT Company. And also we will design Dashboard.

activities.title: Meeting with ATA.IT
activities.description: Get impression from them and advisor. Describe what u have created and show your ideas. Get feedback from them.
